author: Aris Folley
title: 92 percent of inmates tested for COVID-19 at Indiana prison receive positive results
description: The vast majority of inmates that were tested for COVID-19 at a prison in Westville, Ind., have been diagnosed with the virus, officials revealed this week.The District 1 Hospital Emergency Planning Committee, whic...
content:
The vast majority of inmates that were tested for COVID-19 at a prison in Westville, Ind., have been diagnosed with the virus, officials revealed this week.
The District 1 Hospital Emergency Planning Committee, which spans several counties in the state, disc… [+1796 chars]
